timeline.message:
Revamp BallerinaParser qualifier parsing

Give methods performing qualifier based directions, self qualifier parsing capabilities thus allowing them to direct without worrying about the qualifiers.
Address added TODOs from the previous commit
Resolve readonly and distinct keyword parsing ambiguity

timeline.bodyText: Any reason for removing these test cases?
timeline.author: rdulmina

replies.author: lochana-chathura
lochana-chathura

replies.bodyText: But I think it's better to keep them since they are valid test cases @SupunS WDYT?
replies.author: rdulmina

replies.bodyText:
https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/70c5342829156da8525211726b1548d2ad018271/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/test/resources/types/func-type/func_type_source_10.bal
https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/70c5342829156da8525211726b1548d2ad018271/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/test/resources/types/func-type/func_type_source_12.bal

Consider above two test cases. They both same only different is qualifiers.  Also there are invalid tokens in between qualifiers in lot of places and now some of them match with the switch cases in the parsing methods and parser going haywire. Since those test cases no longer test any granular level recovery we don't need to keep them right?

https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/70c5342829156da8525211726b1548d2ad018271/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/test/resources/declarations/isolated-object-methods/isolated_object_method_source_02.bal
https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/master/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/test/resources/declarations/func-definition/func_def_source_25.bal

Above two test cases the same and they are broken due to #26460. I think adding one test case when fixing that issue would be sufficient.
replies.author: lochana-chathura

timeline.bodyText: Its fine to call this parseModuleVarDecl. The overloaded parameters will indicate this takes qualifiers from outside..
timeline.author: SupunS
SupunS

timeline.bodyText: Inverting the condition would be better
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText:
What if we move this, entirely before the switch-case, and only call parseTypeDescQualifiers(qualifiers);, (without the if-check and without the re-parse)?
inside parseTypeDescQualifiers(qualifiers) we can have a while loop, rather than the do-while.
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: Can do the same for top-level nodes as well
replies.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: Invert the condition. Let's do the early exit in all places
timeline.author: SupunS
SupunS

timeline.bodyText: Better to extract this logic inside the 'if-condition' to a separate method, something like isValidMethodQualifier
timeline.author: SupunS
